flawed_nl_solution:
Kim got 2 candy bars a week for 16 weeks so she got 2*16 = <<2*16=23>>23 candy bars
She would only eat 1 candy bar every 4 weeks so in 16 weeks she only ate 16/4 = <<16/4=4>>4 candy bars
She saved 23 candy bars and only ate 4 so she still has 23-4 = <<23-4=19>>19 candy bars

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
